name: Ello
headline: Building the world's first 1:1 AI teacher.

founders.name: Elizabeth Adams, Founder
founders.description: Elizabeth is a clinical psychologist who specializes in child development, child behavior, academic achievement, and working with children and families in community settings, schools, clinics, and hospitals. She has worked with children and families for over 15 years. She is the co-founder of Ello, the first AI reading coach for children that works with real books.

founders.name: Tom Sayer, Founder
founders.description: Tom was the head of impact and adoption programs at Google for Education. He is involved in various organizations promoting education, including GO Public schools and Education Reimagined. Tom also has experience as an intelligence officer, product manager, and EdTech company founder. He holds a first-class honors degree in maths and psychology from Cambridge University and an MBA and MA in Education from Stanford. He has won several awards, including the Lamor prize and the Queen's medal.

founders.name: Catalin Voss, Founder
founders.description: Before co-founding Ello, Catalin was a PhD candidate in AI at Stanford University where he worked on social good projects and built digital therapies for developmental conditions. He co-founded and sold two ML startups, DukaConnect and Sension. He has won the Lemelson-MIT Grad Student prize, Stanford's Kennedy Medal, Forbes' 30 under 30, and Business Insider's 40 under 40. He moved to California from Germany at age 17 and now lives in SF with his partner Ruby and dog Ed.

## Books proven to build skills and a love of reading
### Perfectly tailored to your child
Ello books are adapted to your child’s reading level and interests so that they learn more and love more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/6549d2a2efacde6c6a8701e9_Child%20Image%201%20Desktop.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/6549d92f5ce5bce22b5418ef_Child%20Image%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/6549d768f8709ce4889a4594_Digital%20Books%20Image%20\(1\).png)
### Ello books are written using the Science of Reading
Unlike most children’s books out there, Ello books are [‘decodable’](https://www.ello.com/<https:/www.ello.com/research#decodable>) - a type of writing that is proven to be best for children learning to read.
### Ello also supports **beloved paperbacks and children’s classics**
Want to share beloved childhood stories and support your child’s literacy development with real, physical books? We’ll ship them to you, fully synced with Ello.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/6549d5963c0f09f5a4f9d70c_Classics%20Image%20Desktop.png)

# Frequently Asked Questions
[Membership](https://www.ello.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Gift Boxes](https://www.ello.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Ello App](https://www.ello.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Ello Books](https://www.ello.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Privacy and Security](https://www.ello.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How much is Ello?
Ello with e-books is priced at $14.99 per month, or currently at $139 per year (23% off).If you're looking to start reading today without the AI coaching experience, check out our [free public library with 700+ decodable e-books!](https://www.ello.com/<https:/ello.com/books>)”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Discount access for EBT/SNAP participants?
Ello Access is our special discount program designed to support families who are part of government programs. We believe every child deserves the opportunity to become a confident reader, and Ello Access makes our digital reading experience more affordable.Eligible customers will receive $14 off per month on the Ello Digital subscription, reducing the monthly cost from $14.99 to just $0.99‍
**HOW TO APPLY:**
To apply for Ello Access, please follow these steps:
  1. Fill out the Ello Access form: [Ello Access Form](https://www.ello.com/<https:/airtable.com/appuoSxqTynQgsm0u/paghBMSjPVfOXlGJ6/form>)
  2. Upload proof of eligibility: You'll need to provide proof of your SNAP or EBT program participation (such as a photo of your EBT card).
  3. Review period: We will review your submission within 1 business day.
  4. Receive your discount: If approved, we'll email you a unique coupon code to get Ello at 99¢ per month (instead of the regular $14.99 per month)


You qualify if you have an EBT card, or are enrolled in programs such as Supplemental Security Income (SSI), SNAP, Medicaid, Direct Express Debit Card (DE), Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF), National School Lunch Program (NSLP), Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP), Women, Infants, and Children program (WIC), Tribal assistance eligibility letter (TTANF), or Puerto Rico's Nutrition Assistance Program (NAP).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What’s included in my membership?
Ello with E-books includes:
  * Full App access with digital coaching powered by Adaptive Learn Technology
  * Ello’s library of decodable books
  * Digital prizes for your child’s progress


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How many children can I add to a subscription?
You can add up to 3 reader profiles.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What age range is Ello designed for?
Right now, Ello offers books on reading levels Kindergarten to 3rd grade. We are adding more books all the time so if your child is beyond this or a pre-reader, check back for more updates! Ello is not suited for pre-readers who are not yet decoding basic words.
Generally, Ello works best for children 4–8 years of age but it depends on their reading ability. If they can read the sentence “I am a cat,” they are ready for our earliest level of books! 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How many books does my child get?
Your child will be guided through quests that each contain 4-6 books tailored to their reading level.
Each quest is like a classroom lesson: they give clear instructions, independent reading materials, and practice activities. With each quest, your child unlocks more engaging content to support their reading journey.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Does Ello have a referral program?
Yes! Ello subscribers have the opportunity to refer new customers to the app in exchange for rewards.‍
Here’s how it works:‍
  * Every customer receives a unique referral link when they sign up for Ello (it can be found in “My Account” on the Ello website or in the app)
  * Share that link with friends, family, teachers, or anyone else
  * When someone signs up using your unique link, you’ll be notified by email that someone has started a free trial with Ello
  * If that person finishes their free trial and becomes an Ello subscriber, they will get their first month free
  * Customers who signed up for Ello on our website and make a referral will receive one free month of Ello as a reward
    * The credit for your free month will be applied to your next monthly payment. If you are on an annual plan, your next bill will be reduced by $14.99
    * For every new customer you refer, you receive an additional free month. There is no limit to how many free months you can earn


  * Customers who signed up for Ello directly on the app will receive a free Ello plushie as a reward (limit one per person)


Other questions?Email support@ello.com or text (415) 214 8119
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What is the return policy for gift boxes? 
Returns can be made within 60 days of purchase for a full refund; return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer. Please email support@ello.com for our shipping address. 
‍
 _Return packages must include:_
Return details: full name; email and shipping address on original order; reason for return
Items in original packaging and in original condition. Tracking must be provided for lost package claims.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
When will my gift box ship? 
At checkout, you’ll see an estimated shipping window. We offer free shipping for our gift boxes, with an option to upgrade to priority shipping if you prefer.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Will I get a tracking number for my gift box? 
We will email you with your tracking number as soon as your gift box ships from our warehouse.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How are the gift box books selected?
Our team of literacy experts hand-selected a set of five classic, beloved books that include a range of reading levels in each grade bundle. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How will the Gift Card in the Ello gift box work with membership?
Each Gift Box will come with a physical gift card inside. Gift receivers will redeem their gift card via a special website (link to come) for three months off of an Ello with E-books monthly subscription. They will not only receive access to Ello’s coaching for the full library of over 800 decodable books, but also for the five physical books in their box!
Other questions?Email support@ello.com or text (415) 214 8119
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How does the Ello app work?
Ello helps early readers break down learning barriers by combining artificial intelligence and speech recognition technology to make Ello come to life. Ello is a revolutionary state-of-the-art interactive reading buddy who listens to your child read out loud. Ello provides support when your child needs help reading, gentle corrections when they make errors, and motivation to keep your child engaged. Appropriately leveled books will be automatically loaded into the app for you!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How does my child use Ello?
At the simplest level, Ello is just like a game they play on an iPad or other device. It’s designed to be easy for kids to use, and all they need to do is tap a book and start reading. When they get stuck on a word, they just tap it for help from Ello. As they complete quests, Ello will challenge them a little more each time, and they’ll unlock new, engaging content to keep them moving along their journey.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How does Ello keep my child engaged?
As your child reads, Ello brings the story to life, provides words of encouragement, and helps them if they get stuck so they don't get frustrated. 
We use behavioral psychology and a growth mindset paradigm to keep your child encouraged, help their confidence soar, and build a love of reading. 
Ello offers a reward system as well. In this system, children collect stars and badges, leading up to a completion prize that is either delivered digitally, included in the next box, or both!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
My child is reading the words wrong but Ello isn’t correcting them. What’s going on?
Since children can get easily discouraged, Ello leans on the lenient side. We recommend sitting with your child when they read and helping with some of these corrections yourself. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Is Ello good for kids with dyslexia?
Ello’s instructional method was developed by reading specialists with backgrounds in dyslexia intervention and uses direct, explicit, and sequential phonics instruction. This is exactly what research shows works for helping children with dyslexia learn how to read. Ello is not a comprehensive curriculum or intervention model for dyslexia, it’s a great supplement and we have numerous children with dyslexia using Ello with great success.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What literacy strategies do you use to support my child?
Ello uses proven, phonics-based reading strategies to help your child decode words and develop fluency. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What device is required for Ello?
The Ello app works on iPhones and iPads running iOS 14 and newer. For a complete list, [click here](https://www.ello.com/<https:/www.helloello.com/supported-devices>). Please note that Ello does not currently work on android, samsung tablets, kindle tablets, laptops or desktop computers.
Other questions?Email support@ello.com or text (415) 214 8119
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What kind of books are in the app?
Our digital library has different types of books that are based on the Science of Reading to support your child’s literacy development.
  1. **Decodable books.** These are books designed to help phonetic skills, encouraging independent reading, reinforcing phonics rules, and building confidence.
  2. **Turn-taking books.** These books turn reading into a partner activity, with Ello reading a piece then your child taking a turn. It creates a fun and interactive experience that boosts listening skills, comprehension, and vocabulary.
  3. **Storytime books.** All about fun! Unleash your child’s creativity by crafting their own stories. Ello will read their creations aloud, giving your kid a chance to tackle challenging words and see their progress in action.
  4. **Physical books.** We have a collection of physical books, including beloved classics, that are synced to the Ello app, and available for an additional fee.


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Where do your books come from?
Our e-books in the Ello app come from a special team of authors who specialize in reading education. They are created with the science of reading in mind.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How do you determine my child's reading level?
It’s easy! We’ll ask you a short series of questions after you sign up, and use the answers to estimate your child’s reading level. As they make their way through the program, Ello will automatically adjust to match their level.
If you ever feel the books are too easy or too hard, you can update your child's reading level [here](https://www.ello.com/<https:/portal.helloello.com/account/profiles>).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What does it mean that a book is ‘just right’ for my child? ‍
If a child is reading on the appropriate level, they should make 1-10 mistakes per book. Any more than this and we find they get frustrated and overwhelmed. Less mistakes and we find they get bored and aren’t engaged.
By answering a few short questions, we can help determine your child’s appropriate developmental reading level. We are also happy to set the reading level to whatever they are reading at school, as determined by their teacher. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
The books are too hard or too easy. How do I change the reading level for my child?
No problem! We want each child to have the best experience possible. This means making sure they are reading at the right level for their abilities. You can change your child's reading level [here](https://www.ello.com/<https:/portal.helloello.com/account/profiles>). If you have any trouble, feel free to text Customer Support for assistance.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
When I unlock new books, will we still be able to read the old ones?
Yes! The books will stay available in the app so you can enjoy them over and over again.
Other questions?Email support@ello.com or text (415) 214 8119
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What data do you collect?
If you choose to allow it, we process the audio of your child reading so that Ello can provide real-time support and motivation, and so your child can access certain features of the app, such as listening to themselves read. Separately, you can opt-in to give us access to this data so that we can improve Ello. ‍
We also collect data of your child's progress to provide the service (for example the rewards).‍
Finally, we collect anonymous and aggregated usage data. See our privacy policy for full details.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What do you do with the data you collect?
It is up to you on what data we collect - it is optional. You will be asked if you would like to opt-in to data collection after downloading the app. ‍
All data is anonymous and aggregated and used to improve the product.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Do you sell the data that you collect?
No. Never.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Do you have ads in the app?
No. Never.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How secure is the data you collect?
It's very secure. We use industry-leading encryption and security.
Other questions?Email support@ello.com or text (415) 214 8119

Nick Haber
Advisor
Nick Haber is an Assistant Professor at the Stanford Graduate School of Education, and by courtesy, Computer Science. After receiving his PhD in mathematics on Partial Differential Equation theory, he worked on Sension (with Tom and Catalin), an EdTech company. He then worked with Catalin on the Autism Glass Project at Stanford, a research effort that employs wearable technology and computer vision in a tool for children with autism. Aside from such work on learning and therapeutic tools, he and his research group develop artificial intelligence systems meant to mimic and model the ways people learn early in life, exploring their environments through play, social interaction, and curiosity.

Advisor
Michael Auli is an industry scientist based in Menlo Park, California. His work spans machine learning, speech, and NLP, and he helped create projects such as wav2vec/data2vec, the widely used fairseq toolkit, the first modern feed-forward seq2seq models outperforming RNNs for NLP, and several top-ranked submissions at the WMT news translation task in 2018 and 2019. Before that, Michael was at Microsoft Research, where he did early work on neural machine translation and using neural language models for conversational applications. During his PhD at the University of Edinburgh, he worked on natural language processing and parsing.

How much is Ello?
Ello with e-books is priced at $14.99 per month, or currently at $139 per year (23% off).If you're looking to start reading today without the AI coaching experience, check out our free public library with 700+ decodable e-books!⟨22⟩”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Discount access for EBT/SNAP participants?
Ello Access is our special discount program designed to support families who are part of government programs. We believe every child deserves the opportunity to become a confident reader, and Ello Access makes our digital reading experience more affordable.Eligible customers will receive $14 off per month on the Ello Digital subscription, reducing the monthly cost from $14.99 to just $0.99‍
**HOW TO APPLY:**
To apply for Ello Access, please follow these steps:
  1. Fill out the Ello Access form: Ello Access Form⟨23⟩
  2. Upload proof of eligibility: You'll need to provide proof of your SNAP or EBT program participation (such as a photo of your EBT card).
  3. Review period: We will review your submission within 1 business day.
  4. Receive your discount: If approved, we'll email you a unique coupon code to get Ello at 99¢ per month (instead of the regular $14.99 per month)


You qualify if you have an EBT card, or are enrolled in programs such as Supplemental Security Income (SSI), SNAP, Medicaid, Direct Express Debit Card (DE), Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF), National School Lunch Program (NSLP), Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP), Women, Infants, and Children program (WIC), Tribal assistance eligibility letter (TTANF), or Puerto Rico's Nutrition Assistance Program (NAP).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What’s included in my membership?
Ello with E-books includes:
  * Full App access with digital coaching powered by Adaptive Learn Technology
  * Ello’s library of decodable books
  * Digital prizes for your child’s progress


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How many children can I add to a subscription?
You can add up to 3 reader profiles.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What age range is Ello designed for?
Right now, Ello offers books on reading levels Kindergarten to 3rd grade. We are adding more books all the time so if your child is beyond this or a pre-reader, check back for more updates! Ello is not suited for pre-readers who are not yet decoding basic words.
Generally, Ello works best for children 4–8 years of age but it depends on their reading ability. If they can read the sentence “I am a cat,” they are ready for our earliest level of books! 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How many books does my child get?
Your child will be guided through quests that each contain 4-6 books tailored to their reading level.
Each quest is like a classroom lesson: they give clear instructions, independent reading materials, and practice activities. With each quest, your child unlocks more engaging content to support their reading journey.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Does Ello have a referral program?
Yes! Ello subscribers have the opportunity to refer new customers to the app in exchange for rewards.‍
Here’s how it works:‍
  * Every customer receives a unique referral link when they sign up for Ello (it can be found in “My Account” on the Ello website or in the app)
  * Share that link with friends, family, teachers, or anyone else
  * When someone signs up using your unique link, you’ll be notified by email that someone has started a free trial with Ello
  * If that person finishes their free trial and becomes an Ello subscriber, they will get their first month free
  * Customers who signed up for Ello on our website and make a referral will receive one free month of Ello as a reward
    * The credit for your free month will be applied to your next monthly payment. If you are on an annual plan, your next bill will be reduced by $14.99
    * For every new customer you refer, you receive an additional free month. There is no limit to how many free months you can earn


  * Customers who signed up for Ello directly on the app will receive a free Ello plushie as a reward (limit one per person)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How does the Ello app work?
Ello helps early readers break down learning barriers by combining artificial intelligence and speech recognition technology to make Ello come to life. Ello is a revolutionary state-of-the-art interactive reading buddy who listens to your child read out loud. Ello provides support when your child needs help reading, gentle corrections when they make errors, and motivation to keep your child engaged. Appropriately leveled books will be automatically loaded into the app for you!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How does my child use Ello?
At the simplest level, Ello is just like a game they play on an iPad or other device. It’s designed to be easy for kids to use, and all they need to do is tap a book and start reading. When they get stuck on a word, they just tap it for help from Ello. As they complete quests, Ello will challenge them a little more each time, and they’ll unlock new, engaging content to keep them moving along their journey.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How does Ello keep my child engaged?
As your child reads, Ello brings the story to life, provides words of encouragement, and helps them if they get stuck so they don't get frustrated. 
We use behavioral psychology and a growth mindset paradigm to keep your child encouraged, help their confidence soar, and build a love of reading. 
Ello offers a reward system as well. In this system, children collect stars and badges, leading up to a completion prize that is either delivered digitally, included in the next box, or both!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
My child is reading the words wrong but Ello isn’t correcting them. What’s going on?
Since children can get easily discouraged, Ello leans on the lenient side. We recommend sitting with your child when they read and helping with some of these corrections yourself. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Is Ello good for kids with dyslexia?
Ello’s instructional method was developed by reading specialists with backgrounds in dyslexia intervention and uses direct, explicit, and sequential phonics instruction. This is exactly what research shows works for helping children with dyslexia learn how to read. Ello is not a comprehensive curriculum or intervention model for dyslexia, it’s a great supplement and we have numerous children with dyslexia using Ello with great success.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What literacy strategies do you use to support my child?
Ello uses proven, phonics-based reading strategies to help your child decode words and develop fluency. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What device is required for Ello?
The Ello app works on iPhones and iPads running iOS 14 and newer. For a complete list, click here⟨24⟩. Please note that Ello does not currently work on android, samsung tablets, kindle tablets, laptops or desktop computers.
Other questions?Email support@ello.com or text (415) 214 8119
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What kind of books are in the app?
Our digital library has different types of books that are based on the Science of Reading to support your child’s literacy development.
  1. **Decodable books.** These are books designed to help phonetic skills, encouraging independent reading, reinforcing phonics rules, and building confidence.
  2. **Turn-taking books.** These books turn reading into a partner activity, with Ello reading a piece then your child taking a turn. It creates a fun and interactive experience that boosts listening skills, comprehension, and vocabulary.
  3. **Storytime books.** All about fun! Unleash your child’s creativity by crafting their own stories. Ello will read their creations aloud, giving your kid a chance to tackle challenging words and see their progress in action.
  4. **Physical books.** We have a collection of physical books, including beloved classics, that are synced to the Ello app, and available for an additional fee.


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
Where do your books come from?
Our e-books in the Ello app come from a special team of authors who specialize in reading education. They are created with the science of reading in mind.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
How do you determine my child's reading level?
It’s easy! We’ll ask you a short series of questions after you sign up, and use the answers to estimate your child’s reading level. As they make their way through the program, Ello will automatically adjust to match their level.
If you ever feel the books are too easy or too hard, you can update your child's reading level here⟨25⟩.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What does it mean that a book is ‘just right’ for my child? ‍
If a child is reading on the appropriate level, they should make 1-10 mistakes per book. Any more than this and we find they get frustrated and overwhelmed. Less mistakes and we find they get bored and aren’t engaged.
By answering a few short questions, we can help determine your child’s appropriate developmental reading level. We are also happy to set the reading level to whatever they are reading at school, as determined by their teacher. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
The books are too hard or too easy. How do I change the reading level for my child?
No problem! We want each child to have the best experience possible. This means making sure they are reading at the right level for their abilities. You can change your child's reading level here⟨25⟩. If you have any trouble, feel free to text Customer Support for assistance.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
When I unlock new books, will we still be able to read the old ones?
Yes! The books will stay available in the app so you can enjoy them over and over again.

What data do you collect?
If you choose to allow it, we process the audio of your child reading so that Ello can provide real-time support and motivation, and so your child can access certain features of the app, such as listening to themselves read. Separately, you can opt-in to give us access to this data so that we can improve Ello. ‍
We also collect data of your child's progress to provide the service (for example the rewards).‍
Finally, we collect anonymous and aggregated usage data. See our privacy policy for full details.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/652e0352ad50feae8734edac/652e0352ad50feae8734f374_Vector%2017.svg)
What do you do with the data you collect?
It is up to you on what data we collect - it is optional. You will be asked if you would like to opt-in to data collection after downloading the app. ‍
All data is anonymous and aggregated and used to improve the product.

Do you sell the data that you collect?
No. Never.

No. Never.

It's very secure. We use industry-leading encryption and security.

## Designed by experts to maximize your child’s reading potential
We did all the research so you don’t have to. Ello is designed by a team of experts, academics, researchers, and child psychologists to make sure it is exactly what your child needs and loves.

Dr. Elizabeth Adams
Co-Founder, CXO
Elizabeth is a clinical psychologist who specializes in child development, child behavior, and working with children and families in community settings, schools, clinics, and hospitals. She provides training and education to students and professionals, has presented at national and international conferences, has published articles and book chapters on child development, and has been interviewed by magazines and radio programs on a variety of parent topics. Nick Haber
Advisor
Nick Haber is an Assistant Professor at the Stanford Graduate School of Education, and by courtesy, Computer Science. After receiving his PhD in mathematics on Partial Differential Equation theory, he worked on Sension (with Tom and Catalin), an EdTech company. generated_description:
**Company Overview: Ello**

Founded in 2020 and located in the bustling tech hub of San Francisco, Ello aims to revolutionize the education landscape with its mission to create the world’s first 1:1 AI teacher. As a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W20, Ello is staffed by a dedicated team of 26 employees and led by Group Partner Michael Seibel.

**What They Do**

Ello develops an innovative reading app designed specifically for children in Kindergarten through 3rd grade. This app acts as a personalized reading coach, utilizing their proprietary Adaptive Learn™ technology to create a tailored learning experience that understands, adapts, and responds to each child's unique reading level and interests. The goal? To transform young learners into enthusiastic readers while addressing the significant gap in reading proficiency among early elementary school children.

**Core Features and Offerings**

1. **Adaptive Read-Along Companion**: The Ello app features interactive, decodable e-books and a one-on-one coaching experience reminiscent of personal tutoring.
2. **Flexible Pricing**: After a 7-day free trial, the subscription is priced at $14.99 per month, with a yearly option for $139 (23% off).
3. **Gift Boxes**: For $59, recipients receive a gift box with three months of app access, five grade-level books, and fun activities, making reading a delightful gift.
4. **Wide Range of Resources**: Ello includes a free public library with over 700 decodable e-books, parental resources, and materials for teachers.

**Impact and Vision**

Ello emerged to tackle a pressing challenge: millions of kids are not receiving the individualized literacy support they need during crucial early learning years. By promoting confidence and independence in reading, Ello not only helps children improve their reading skills but also nurtures a love for literature. Their AI tutor has garnered positive attention from experts and parents alike, supported by research that backs their educational methodologies.

**Conclusion**

In a world where data-driven solutions meet educational needs, Ello embodies a promising blend of technology and pedagogy, committed to maximizing every child's reading potential. If you want to empower young readers in an engaging way, give Ello a try—building a brighter, literate future is just a read away.

For more information, you can visit their [website](https://www.ello.com).
